title: Merger improves efficiency with economies of scale

content.question: A merger of two firms may increase economic efficiency by

choices.label: decreasing average total cost through an increase in economies of scale
decreasing output to reduce marginal cost and equalize price
increasing economic profits but decreasing consumer surplus
increasing consumer surplus by decreasing economic profits
increasing consumer surplus by shifting the demand curve for the product to the right

content.answer: decreasing average total cost through an increase in economies of scale

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
